Name: Sunny Breeze
Ingredients: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: A suitably named refreshing long drink with an adult dry edge and kick.
History: Created in 2003 by yours truly (Simon Difford).
Nutrition: One serving of Sunny Breeze contains 250 calories
